name: Hidden Desire
description:
HIDDEN DESIRE is a sexual adventure that encourages lewd lust. Take on the role of a director of erotic films on your way to worldwide fame and provide your companions with a place in the sun.
However, in order to reward your audience with quality films, you will have to work hard to achieve financial success. And your boundless charm will allow you to meet girls not only for filming, but also for personal pleasure, which expands the possibilities of gameplay.
